name: VIDEO: COVID-19 Vaccines for Children
description: Children ages 5 years and older are now eligible to receive the COVID-19 vaccine.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Children ages 5 years and older are now eligible to receive the COVID-19 vaccine to help protect them and the people around them from Coronavirus. Despite their unanimous dislike for needles, a steady stream of children and their parents have been quick to line-up and take a big step back… to life before the pandemic.
